item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

1/2/2012's location is:

Prime 16

Prime 16 is located on Temple Street and has one of the best selections of Draft and Bottled Beers in downtown. (Was clear cut THE best before Cask Republic arrived.)  For food a wide selection of Great Burgers is accompanied by some of the best Truffle Fries and Sweet Potato Fries in New Haven.  (In both cases: Arguably THE best with a few other locations.)

No Special Specials this time around, just their normal Monday that in the past has been:
1/2 price Premium Drafts until 7PM and $3 Sea Hag IPA cans from 7 till close.
I will let you know if/when I know they are any different.

Come break your New Years Resolution Early!  (Unless it's to Drink More, in which case get started on it!)

Please RSVP.  For Happy Hour type events if you're only a MAYBE put this in the text section of your RSVP.

Your contact is ME... (A.K.A "A.J.") Cell phone is 315-345-9348, you can call or text.

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...
Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours.
Ever.
***Bring a friend***
item.how_to_find_us: AJ's cell phone is 315-345-9348, if it's loud then texting is better, though it's not a big place so look around for him.
item.name: Happy Hour - Prime 16
